attributes.action: Show solidarity for the victims of post brexit racism
attributes.additional_details: I'm just an ordinary British person who feels the Brexit campaign has given a big voice to a small minority. Show the racists that we reject them and that we the people will not tolerate that disgusting behaviour.
attributes.background:
On Thursday the 23rd of June the uk partook in a referendum to decide whether we should remain as a part of the EU. As a result of the referendum there has been a sharp spike in racist hate crimes. 
No matter how you voted, stand up to racism, show those who have been affected your solidarity.
